created.description: The timestamp of when the stream was created.

updated.description: The timestamp of when the stream was updated.

nodeIdentity.description: The identity of the node which controls the stream.

userIdentity.description: The identity of the user who created the stream.

metadata.description: The metadata to associate with the entry as JSON-LD.

immutableInterval.description: After how many entries do we add immutable checks.

description: Interface describing an auditable item stream.
